name: Goblin
description: Clever, adaptive, and often underestimated, goblins thrive through cunning and creativity. Whether in bustling cities or wild outlaw camps, goblins bring a unique spark to every corner of the Realm.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Nimble Escape
features.description: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action.
